long.ar,bg,bn,ca,da,de,el,es,es_419,et,fa,fi,:
I am a huge Usher fan. And as I love mixing working and pleasure, I created this Usher New Tab Chrome extension.

Features:
- daily awesome new image of Usherr!
- easy navigation between Google search and Apps, Bookmarks, Most Visited and Last Visited
- speed dial
- cool quote

Permissions explained:
- In order to display in a super-friendly way all bookmarks, apps and most/last visited sites, the extension needs to read those first. That's it :)

Feedback will be highly appreciated.
If you like it, please give it 5* rating.

Tired of Usher coolness? Uninstall it in a blink of an eye: go to chrome://extensions and deactivate the extension. 

Have fun!
long.am,cs,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,ko:
I am a huge Usher fan. And as I love mixing working and pleasure, I created this Usher New Tab Chrome extension.

Features:
- daily awesome new images of Usherr!
- easy navigation between Google search and Apps, Bookmarks, Most Visited and Last Visited
- speed dial
- cool quote
- link to a mega deals website

Permissions explained:
- In order to display in a super-friendly way all bookmarks, apps and most/last visited sites, the extension needs to read those first. That's it :)

Feedback will be highly appreciated.
If you like it, please give it 5* rating.

Tired of Usher coolness? Uninstall it in a blink of an eye: go to chrome://extensions and deactivate the extension. 

Have fun!

Disclosure: some of the links from this extension have an affiliate code attached, so I can get some change if you buy from them.  This will allow us to further improve this extension in the future. Thank you.
